net.floodlightcontroller.topology
Class TopologyManager

java.lang.Object
  net.floodlightcontroller.topology.TopologyManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHAListener, IListener<OFType>, IOFMessageListener, IFloodlightModule, IFloodlightService, ILinkDiscovery, ILinkDiscoveryListener, IRoutingService, ITopologyService
public class TopologyManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFloodlightModule, ITopologyService, IRoutingService, ILinkDiscoveryListener, IOFMessageListener, IHAListener

Topology manager is responsible for maintaining the controller's notion of the network graph, as well as implementing tools for finding routes through the topology.

ILinkDiscovery.LDUpdate, ILinkDiscovery.LinkType, ILinkDiscovery.SwitchType, ILinkDiscovery.UpdateOperation

createNewInstance

public void createNewInstance()
This function computes a new topology intance. It ignores links connected to all broadcast domain ports and tunnel ports.
